body: I always receive heartfelt thanks for such a thoughtful and lasting wedding gift

title: Beautiful, strong and wonderful fragrance
body: I was bought this rose as a wedding gift nine years ago. It took a move from the original place we planted it but it’s now very happy and forms part of a mixed hedge. It needs you to be brutal and it’ll reward you. Absolutely love the way the flowers change colour and still very thankful for the gift :)
